titleStmt.title: Sample B13 from The Times-Picayune, [New Orleans]

June 19, 1961, sec. 3, p.11 "Shoes Made For..." by Ann Audubon "How To Keep Well" by Dr. T.R. Van Dellen "On the Square" by Frank Gagnard January 31, 1961, sec.3, p.4 "Depressing Experiences" by Clayton Rand "Your Baby and Mine" by Myrtle Meyer Eldred

encodingDesc.p: Arbitrary Hyphen: semi-heights [0100]Typographical Errors: Ille [for Ile] [240] bushing [for brushing] [0490] bushes [for brushes] [0400] of [for off] [0580] unforseen [1300] lacey [for lacy] [0170,0280] Peal [for Peale] [1220]
